means: 轻吹，胡说八道，嘟嘟地发出

sentence.Network_en: Arnold said investigators learned about Tootle's activities from Braxton.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿诺德说,调查员从布拉克斯顿那里了解了屠特的一些行为.

sentence.Network_en: Nice talking to you. I must tootle along.
sentence.Network_cn: 和你谈话很高兴. 我必须得走了.

sentence.Network_en: Tootle resigned before the warrant was issued, said Ronnie Arnold, Escambia County School District spokesman.
sentence.Network_cn: 屠特已经在逮捕令签发前离职, 艾斯坎比亚县学区发言人罗尼·阿诺德说.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 求念tao音或者接近tao的发音的英文单词_百度知道 ... title 标题 tootle 唠叨 totle 整个.

entry.tran: 悠闲自得地去；不慌不忙地开车去
entry.def: If you tootle somewhere, you travel or go there without rushing or without any particular aim.

example.ex: I'm sure Ted is tootling down the motorway at this very moment.
example.tran: 我确信泰德此刻正悠闲自得地开车行驶在高速路上。

entry.def: If you tootle a tune on an instrument, you play it quietly, without concentrating or taking it seriously.

example.ex: McCann tootled a tune on the piano.
example.tran: 麦卡恩在钢琴上随手轻弹一曲。

means.word_mean: 1. sound of tooting softly and repeatedly as on a flute
